ygData.subject: Re: some info
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Why do you think that these are powerful items??  Merchants charge more for a plain old longsword then a combine.  The price isn t determined by the power
ygData.messageBody:
Quasinom de Plume wrote:

>
>
> Making those bags would be quite impressive, however I imagine also very
> expensive to make taking in consideration how much they vendors sell them.
> Personally, I'm not convinced Verant would allow us to make such a
> powerful item but it will be interesting to see.

Why do you think that these are powerful items?? Merchants charge more for a
plain old longsword then a combine. The price isn't determined by the power
of an item with merchants, and in fact verant seems to have made more powerful
items worth less to vendors in order to promote a player run economy.


--Eron
aeron@...

from The Simpsons:

"D'OH!" --Homer J. Simpson
